# Application description

## User stories

1. As a software developer or any other employee I want to start a timer with a title, an optional description and a reference to a specific project, when I start working on a task. After I'm done with the task I want to stop the timer and it should be saved with the time I worked on the task.
2. As a software developer or any other employee I want to add a time tracking entry on my own by freely entering the time spent on a task. It should be saved with the time I worked on the task.
3. As a software developer or any other employee I want to create reports regarding the time spent on specific tasks and projects.
4. As a software developer or any other employee I want to use Open Web UI to create a time entry.
5. As a software developer or any other employee I want to use Open Web UI create reports regarding the time spent on projects and tasks.
